note.text:
Plasters cause me an issue, which may be very itchy and it sticks
 my broken finger together. Can't eat with it on my finger as the
 saucy food is absorbed in it tastes yukky.

extension.valueString:
The headlice fell off due to not eating corn for a while
I hope this is a lesson to everyone.
Archiving. Unclear and unproven if asthma is triggered due to aspirin.

Symptoms have subsided, 
no bloating experienced in the pass few years.
